item.title: About me
item.description: Who am I (cliche I know): Name: Alex/f0rg What do I do? Eating, sleeping, computers, being boring. What do you love? Hardware, the colors red and orange (burnt orange is bae), eating (it is the way to my heart) Oh did I mention I love hardware? Oh I also love ducks. I mostly shitpost on infosec.exchange at @alex_02. I also should note this is a personal account and I could care less about creating “professional” and/or “mature” posts.
